featured.text: But this story written 40 years ago __(27)__ predicted the arrival of a recent method of genetic engineering—cloning.
Traders from Asia had already visited the islands 900 years before the arrival of its first permanent settlers from the African mainland (around 1000 AD).
In order to draw her family tree, Mary tried to trace her back to their arrival in North America.

definition.zh_def: 到達，抵達某地或某事件的開始。
definition.en_def: The act of reaching a destination or the time when someone or something arrives.
definition.example: Her arrival at the party was unexpected.
